display_long_description:
# Experience a new dimension of fear and let horror bleed into your space.

Scares spill from the screen with visual effects that pull you into the Blumhouse universe. Feel more of the suspense, dread, and terror that you love.

**Why VR Enhanced?**

• Iconic films reimagined to be scarier than ever.

• Immersive effects and spatial audio.

• Cinema that surrounds you.


# Featured Experiences:
• **The Black Phone** – A teenage boy is abducted by a sadistic killer (Ethan Hawke) and discovers a phone in his basement cell that allows him to communicate with the killer's previous victims.
[media]
• **M3GAN** – A prototype doll and marvel of A.I., is paired with a young girl, leading to unimaginable consequences.
[media]

Developed by Nexus Studios.


This app contains streamed content and requires a high quality internet connection. You may experience latency issues or discomfort if your connectivity is interrupted. Streamed content is provided by NBCUniversal and may not always be available.

Rentals are available 48 hours after the first viewing for up to 3 complete viewings. Rental is tied to one user account per headset, and only available to that user.


Content Sold Separately.  Available in the United States only.

Please ensure you're on the latest public OS version.
